content.body: good morning, all
Thanks to Luca we've made some minor schedule adjustments to better accommodate folks' time constraints
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Thanks to Luca we've made some minor schedule adjustments to better accommodate folks' time constraints

content.body: This means we have _**Record & Tuple**_ in the first morning session today, and have pushed out _**Intl.DurationFormat**_ & _**LibJS**_ to tomorrow.  This makes way for Guy's topics (_**Import Reflection, Defer Eval**_) at the end of today.
